phrs.translation: 商品存货；商品盘存；库存商品

sentences.sentence: export and import business of its own merchandises;
sentences.translation: 自营商品的进出口业务；

sentences.sentence: Even more, some of these merchandises lose much money.
sentences.translation: 甚至，有些商品损失多少钱。

sentences.sentence: I am sorry and we are responsible for the mistake we will exchange all merchandises that fall short of our sample.
sentences.translation: 这次差错完全使我们的责任。非常抱歉。与样品不符合的货物全部无偿调换。
